title: S15 Ep49: Poltergeist! A Destructive Haunting
itunes:title: Poltergeist! A Destructive Haunting
description:
Darkness Radio cowers in fear from Poltergeist! A Destructive Haunting with guest John Fraser.

John leads us in a deeper dive into this popular phenomena of poltergeist activity. What are we able to see through years of research, is this simply cases of violent ghosts or powerful expulsions of chaotic energy and what happens when they overlap.

Preorder the book here: https://amazon.com

Get other awesome books and paranormal swag here:
https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
